quote: Freedom is the only worthy goal in life. It is won by disregarding things that lie beyond our control. – Epictetus
fact: The verb "cleave" is the only English word with two synonyms which are antonyms of each other: adhere and separate.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: I ordered a chicken and an egg from Amazon. I'll let you know.
